title.rendered: Facebook Down! A panel reflection from eCommerce leaders

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 24:52 — 45.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 24:52 — 45.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Unless you were living under a rock last week, you’ll have noticed that Facebook had a serious 6-hour  outage.
What might this thought-provoking event mean for ecommerce sellers?

You’ll Learn:

  • How warren buffett’s famous quote applies to what we discover when a chanel goes downA
  • Why “farming someone else’s land” is a risk
  • Whether your business is “Tiger proof”
  • The other risks outside marketing and sales channels to your business
  • The dangers of “feature failure” on a marketing platform
  • Why you need to own your own customer and prospect lists
